title: Nothing Phone 3 Review: A Comprehensive Guide
overview: This guide provides a detailed review of the Nothing Phone 3. It explores its key features, performance, and overall value. Discover if the Nothing Phone 3 is the right phone for you. Is the Nothing Phone 3 a true flagship?

subsections.title: Analyzing the Nothing Phone 3's Position
subsections.content: Determine if the Nothing Phone 3 is a flagship. Consider its chipset, display, and battery. Does it compete with other top-tier phones? Evaluate its price point. Is it priced like a flagship? These factors determine its true position in the market.

subsections.title: Understanding the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4
subsections.content:
The Nothing Phone 3 uses the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chip. This chip is a step down from the Snapdragon 8 Elite. The 8s Gen 4 offers improved performance over the Nothing Phone 2. It provides 40% better CPU and 90% better GPU performance. This is ideal for graphically intense tasks such as gaming. 

Phones like the Poco F7 and Iqoo Neo 10 also use this chip. They are priced under $500. While the phone feels fast, graphically intense tasks may reveal performance limits. This impacts gaming or video editing.

sections.title: Display Quality: AMOLED with Gorilla Glass 7i

subsections.title: Exploring the Nothing Phone 3 Display
subsections.content: The phone features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display. It has a 120Hz refresh rate. The display offers 1600 nits outdoor brightness. Peak HDR brightness reaches 4500 nits. The display is bright and sharp. Gorilla Glass 7i provides screen protection. Flagships use Gorilla Glass Victus or Victus 2. The 1000Hz touch sample rate makes it responsive. 2160Hz PWM dimming reduces eye strain. The display is LTPS. The refresh rate varies from 30 to 120Hz. It is not 1 to 120Hz. This may result in slightly worse power efficiency.

subsections.title: Maximizing Battery Life
subsections.content: The Nothing Phone 3 has a large battery. It is marketed as 5150mAh. It is rated at 5500mAh silicon carbon. It supports 65W fast charging. Wireless charging and reverse charging are also supported. The phone can last two days on a single charge.
